course_title: Land and Indigenous Self-Determination: Introduction to Theoretical Perspectives

005.comments: This section is offered as part of the Dechinta Certificate in Land Based Research and is not open for registration. Visit dechinta.ca for more information.

description: Cultural, political, and economic context that informs the experiences of Indigenous people and communities. Experiential, intensive land-based course designed and delivered in collaboration with academic faculty and Indigenous community partner(s).
